about_the_game:
Codebreakers is a chaotic VR Action Shooter that takes place in a dystopian future where various organizations are fighting for control of the world order.

You are part of D.A.T.A, an entity dedicated to stealing information from these organizations for their own benefit.
You will have to infiltrate, defeat enemies and avoid security systems to extract data.
Each mission awards you points that increase your rating on the organization's leader board - do you have what it takes to make it to the top?




As a "breaker", your main objective is to complete contracts and climb the D.A.T.A. ranks.
Contracts can be of different types and difficulties, and will be updated each time the player returns from a mission.

The immersive gameplay, the frenetic music, the variety of weapons and the powers available to you will make you feel the adrenaline at every moment.
Most missions are races against the clock. If you take it easy, enemy reinforcements will come for you.





- Different game modes
Most missions are counter-intelligence missions, but boss assassination and massacre missions are also available.

- Replayability
There will be different mission types on various maps or environments, and various difficulties that will be unlocked as you progress through the game.

- Powers
The SRX-530 gloves you'll wear during the game are the latest in military technology, offering the wearer the ability to grab and throw things from a distance, manipulate the perception of time in their environment, and detect nearby biological organisms.

- Frenetic music
Nothing better for a boomer shooter style than tremendous music to accompany the player as they complete their objectives at full speed.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features frequent violence against fictional characters and depiction of criminal acts
